text:
My life is a bit related (could say a mess)
me and my ex are more than lovers and we still keep in touch as best friends because we just don't want to see one another disappear forever and i love him endlessly but life goes on 
one day, i met someone who my ex didn't seem to like
but somehow something happened and now, i'm waiting for pregnancy test 
i hope i will not end up being a single mom﻿
author: Tina Sunkmn
